html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08642018-06-21,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Sheilah L. Martin ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder authorizing additional reimbursement periods for the Hon. SHEILAH L. MARTIN, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, further to her relocation from Calgary, Alberta to the National Capital Region, for the cost of maintaining her former residence and for the travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still resident in the former residence for the period beginning on June 19, 2018 and ending on December 18, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Hon. Sheilah L. Martin ** Removal Allowance **
precis: Order authorizing additional reimbursement periods for the Hon. SHEILAH L. MARTIN, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, further to her relocation from Calgary, Alberta to the National Capital Region, for the cost of maintaining her former residence and for the travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still resident in the former residence for the period beginning on June 19, 2018 and ending on December 18, 2018.
